description.diamond-pearl:
This attack inflicts
high damage on a
sleeping foe. It
also wakes the foe
up, however.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.shortEffect: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
